cause.description:
because we swim in water that people have pissed in and fish, dolphins, and marine life have taken a shit in, our mission is to fill the whole ocean with chlorine to make it cleaner, and at the same time put masks on all fish, dolphins, sharks, whales, etc. so that they don't die
1. People shouldn't have to swim in dirty water
cause.mission: make oceans cleaner so its less disgusting to swim in
cause.name: Fill the ocean with chlorine and put masks on all marine life so that life doesn't die but germs do
